directions: Pureé grapes, apples, mint, sugar, vitamin C, and 2 cups wine in 2 batches in a blender until smooth, then strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a bowl, pressing on solids. Transfer pureé to a pitcher and stir in remaining wine. Chill, covered, at least 2 hours. Serve over ice.
ingredients: 2 small Granny Smith apples, coarsely chopped
1 (500-mg) vitamin C tablet, crushed to a powder with back of
2 bottles dry white wine (preferably Albariño or Pinot Grigio)
title: Green-Grape Sangria
